Title: Onthara Bannagalu
Writer: Sunil Bhimrao, Murali Hebbar, Srinidhi Srivathsa
Actors: Sadhu Kokila, Sonu Gowda, Sharath Lohitashwa, Veena Sundar
Plot: Onthara Bannagalu is a Kannada Feature Film about the emotional journey of 5 characters; the way characters react to situations and circumstances they encounter.
